response.overview: In April 1940, amidst the shattered streets of war-torn Warsaw, Elena, a determined Jewish mother, fights to protect her children, Ezra and Rivka, from the merciless grip of Nazi occupation. As the horrors of war close in, she clings to the fragile hope of preserving their innocence and childhood. But when the cold and ruthless SS officer Erich crosses their path, Elena’s unwavering courage is put to the ultimate test.
response.tagline: War steals childhood. She won’t let it.
response.title: Shadows Of Innocence
